channel.title: Help me my client wont runnn and i need to download paint!
channel.description: Help me fix it tell me links what to download to get server and client working and where do i download paint? Thank you for helping!!

item.title: Help me my client wont runnn and i need to download paint!
item.dc:creator: @Bingo324 Bingo324
item.description:
@Bingo324 wrote:

Paint comes with Windows. If you’re on OSX you’re stuffed.

To find paint:

Go to Start => Run => mspaint.exe and hit enter. There you go - paint. Alternatively, if you’re using Internet Explorer, click here and select Run. Don’t worry, it’s not a virus - it’s running from your computer. About 15% of the time, this link fails as the root drive letter of the computer is not C:, but it should work. You may have to delete the http:// at the start of the path if the page does not load.

Client: moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html (install it), does not work under Vista if I remember correctly

Server: Whichever you like - Google for one. Suggestions (click to Google it):
TestScape
CheezScape
Allstar-Scape

Read full topic
item.source: Help me my client wont runnn and i need to download paint!
